review: The Stick works great. Streams everything perfectly.
author: Anthony Corso

review: Not Happy at all. We bought it because the Xbox was always having trouble loading. But the fire stick is worse. I'm disappointed with the purchase.
author: Rebecca Johnson

review: Item was as advertised and received in excellent condition. I am very happy with it and would recommend it to others.
author: Boomer

review: Nice setup But wish had local channels offered.  I still can't figure out how to do prime shows though So I stick to Netflix Easier to watch.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I've been a cable cutter for 3 years. Using mainly Roku. My Roku stick (6 months old) went out in the spare bedroom. So I figured rather than fighting returns and warranty. I'd just try the Fire Stick. Really easy to set up especially if you are already a prime member. It comes set up on your account. So Far So Good! Only 4 stars until it lasts more than 6 months.....
author: Edward A.

review: works great thanks for fast service
author: WILLIAM DAUGHERTY

review: I purchased this because my tv is no longer going to support Amazon prime.  It works great.
author: M. Morris "mount"
